label: Biondi, Maurizio & Paola D’Alessandro.  2017. Guilielmia Weise, a little known Afrotropical flea beetle genus: systematic  affinities and description of a second new species from Central Africa (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini). Zootaxa 4323(4): 572–578.
value: Biondi, Maurizio & Paola D’Alessandro.  2017. Guilielmia Weise, a little known Afrotropical flea beetle genus: systematic  affinities and description of a second new species from Central Africa (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini). Zootaxa 4323(4): 572–578.
title: Guilielmia Weise, a little known Afrotropical flea beetle genus: systematic affinities and description of a second new species from Central Africa (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini)
